thread.title: Woman Busted For Knifing Trump Sign Because It ‘Ruined Her Chill’
thread.title_full: Woman Busted For Knifing Trump Sign Because It ‘Ruined Her Chill’

author: Eric Owens
title: Woman Busted For Knifing Trump Sign Because It ‘Ruined Her Chill’

organizations.name: big pine key at r & t vinyl signs

text:
Monroe County Sheriffs Office 5438502 
Police in the Florida Keys arrested a woman on Friday for knifing up a vinyl sign promoting Donald Trump. 
The woman, Elizabeth McSurdy, told Monroe County Sheriff’s deputies she slashed the Trump sign because it “ruined her chill,” reports NBC Miami . 
The slashing incident occurred on the relaxing island of Big Pine Key at R & T Vinyl Signs —“ custom vinyl signs, lettering, banners & wraps ”— at about 5 p.m. on Friday. 
According to the owners of R & T Vinyl Signs, McSurdy also confronted them and threatened them as she was holding the Trump-sign-cutting weapon. 
McSurdy, a 30-year-old resident of Oakland, California, admitted slashing the sign and holding a knife but denied threatening the business owners, sheriff’s deputies said. 
The size of the knife is unclear. 
The deputies were able to identify McSurdy because employees at R & T Vinyl Signs snapped a photo of her automobile as she was driving off. 
McSurdy has been arrested and faces charges of aggravated assault and criminal mischief. 
It’s not clear if she has posted bail.
